name: alspy
description: A minimalist Albanian-language Spyfall game built with Go, TypeScript, and Bun.
author: Segeraldo Doci

scripts.build: bun build src/ts/main.ts --outdir=public/out --minify --target=browser && bunx tailwindcss -i public/css/styles.css -o public/out/styles.css --minify && bun run scripts/compress-assets.ts
scripts.lint: bunx eslint . --ext .js,.ts && bunx stylelint '**/*.css' && bunx htmlhint 'views/**/*.html' && bunx markdownlint-cli2 '**/*.md'
